author: Staff Reporter
Karthik Madhavan
text:
Chain snatched

Unidentified persons on Wednesday snatched a gold chain weighing about 40 gm worn by D. Premalatha (43), resident of Annur, while she was walking along the Kurumbapalayam-Annur Road.

Liquor bottles burgled

The police have arrested Divnesh (28), and Arun (18) on the charge of burgling liquor bottles from a liquor shop, near Olympus, early on Friday. The police said that the employees of the nearby bar caught them while fleeing with the bottles.

Two held

The police have arrested Mathu (48) and Vijayakumar (49) on the charge of stealing jewellery from cars. Following incidents in Arts College Road and Balasundram Road, the police had formed a special team to nab the culprits.
title: CRIME NOTES
